title: Navarathna Pearl and Emerald Haaralu - A Symphony of Tradition and Elegance
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ). The gold features a rich
antique Hyderabadi polish enhancing its vintage charm.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a multi-strand design, featuring delicate Hyderabadi pearls and vibrant emerald beads. The intricate gold clasps are adorned with CZ stones and a central emerald, displaying a traditional South Indian floral motif. The cascading emerald strands create a graceful and elegant drape.
colors: and warm gold tones create a rich and vibrant color palette.
occasions: and festive occasions. This Haaram adds a touch of regal elegance to traditional attire
description: This Haaram blends the opulence of Hyderabadi pearls and emeralds with the timeless charm of South Indian design. The antique Hyderabadi polish adds a touch of heritage, while the meticulous craftsmanship ensures lasting beauty and durability. A statement piece that embodies tradition and sophistication.
